claude_oauth.title: Authenticate with Claude Pro / Claude Max
claude_oauth.description:
Sign in with your Claude **Pro** or **Max** account (or an eligible **Team/Enterprise** seat) to authorize Home Assistant.

1. [Click here to authenticate]({auth_url})
2. Sign in and authorize the app
3. After authorizing, you'll see a page with your authorization code
4. Copy and paste the code below

**Redirect URI:** `{redirect_uri}`

openai.title: Configure OpenAI / compatible
openai.description: Enter an API key for OpenAI (or an OpenAI-compatible server) and optionally override the base URL.

openai_codex.title: Authenticate with ChatGPT Plus / Pro for Codex
openai_codex.description:
Sign in with your **ChatGPT Plus**, **ChatGPT Pro**, **ChatGPT Business**, or **ChatGPT Enterprise** account to authorize Home Assistant for Codex.

1. [Click here to authenticate]({auth_url})
2. Sign in and authorize
3. You'll be redirected to a localhost URL that may not load
4. Copy and paste the full redirect URL (or just the `code=` value)

**Redirect URI:** `{redirect_uri}`

gemini_cli.title: Authenticate with Google AI Pro
gemini_cli.description:
Sign in with your Google account to authorize **Google AI Pro**, which includes **Gemini Code Assist** and **Gemini CLI**.

1. [Click here to authenticate]({auth_url})
2. Sign in and consent
3. You'll be redirected to a localhost URL that may not load
4. Copy and paste the full redirect URL

**Redirect URI:** `{redirect_uri}`

data_description.enabled_tools: Choose which extra AI Subscription Assist tools this agent can call.
data_description.prompt: Instruct how the LLM should respond. This can be a template.
data_description.yolo_mode: Disables exposure safeguards and unlocks privileged tools (dashboard/automation edits, log access). Use only for trusted agents.

data_description.thinking_budget: The number of tokens the model can use to think about the response out of the total maximum number of tokens. Set to 1024 or greater to enable extended thinking.
data_description.thinking_effort: Control how many tokens Claude uses when responding, trading off between response thoroughness and token efficiency
data_description.user_location: Localize search results based on home location
data_description.web_search: The web search tool gives Claude direct access to real-time web content, allowing it to answer questions with up-to-date information beyond its knowledge cutoff
data_description.web_search_max_uses: Limit the number of searches performed per response
